src:
Ishonchli va xavfsiz uy-joy farovon hayotning eng muhim mezonidir

04 Nov 2019, 09:00




“Usta Shirin” – bu barcha xalqaro standartlarga javob beradigan, siz va oilangiz uchun hashamatli yashash sharoitlarini ta’minlaydidan turar joy majmuasidir. Modern Stroy qurilish kompaniyasi o‘zining noyobligi bilan ajralib turadigan yangi “Usta Shirin” turar joy majmuasining qurilish ishlari hozirgi kunda avjida. Qurilish jarayonida eng yangi texnologiyalar va sifatli materiallardan foydanilmoqda. Majmuaning qulay joylashuvini ham alohida ta’kidlash joiz. Qurilayotgan majmua har taraflama qulayliklarga ega bo‘lgan hududda joylashgan .



Xonadonlar maydoni 63 m² dan 600 m² gacha tashkil etadi. Bundan tashqari, pentxauslar ham mavjud. Bu yerda siz shahar shovqinidan holi bo‘lgan holda sokin yashash imkoniga egasiz. Bino qurilishi shunday tuzilganki, kun davomida turar joyning har ikki tomonidan ham quyosh nuri tushadi. Bunga qo‘shimcha ravishda qurilish uchun yaxshi tanlangan joylar tufayli siz toza havodan bahramand bo‘lasiz.



Bundan tashqari, bizning hududimizda sun’iy hovuzlar, ko‘kalamzorlashtirilgan parklar, fitnes markazi, basseyn va o‘yin maydonchalari mavjud.  Aholi sog‘lig‘iga g‘amxo‘rlik qilib, biz ularni sog‘lom turmush tarziga mos keladigan sharoitlar bilan ta’minlashga harakat qildik.



Umumiy maydoni 1,07 gektar bo‘lgan uchta ko‘p qavatli (10 qavatli) binolardan iborat turar joy majmuasi sizga quyidagi qulayliklarni taklif etadi:

Ponoramali deraza romlar;
2,3 metrgacha kenglikdagi terassali balkonlar;
Balandligi 3 metr bo‘lgan shiftlarga ega xonalar;
Maxsus isitish tizimi
Ichki xodimlar tomonidan doimiy tozalik
Fitnes markazi va basseyn
Ekologik uy, sun’iy hovuzlar, ko‘kalamzorlashtirilgan bog‘lar
Yozgi (ochiq) va qishki (yopiq) bolalar o‘yin maydonchalari
Turar joy majmuasida ochiq pavilyonlar va skameykalar
Yer osti to‘xtash joyi
24 soatlik xavfsizlik
Rivojlangan infratuzilma (restoranlar, savdo nuqtalari, ko‘ngilochar muassasalar)
Smart Home tizimi bilan jihozlash
Yoritish moslamalarida energiya tejaydigan tizimlardan, ekologik quyosh panellaridan foydalanish
Zamonaviy Yevropa standartlariga muvofiq yuqori tezlikda, shovqinsiz harakatlanuvchi ponoramali liftlar.
Mahalliy maktabgacha ta’lim muassasasi




Shuni ta’kidlashni istardikki “Usta Shirin” turar joy majmuasida noturar joylarning savdosi boshlangan.



Sizning biznesingiz uchun kompaniyamiz  1-2 qavatni, shuningdek, yerto‘la maydonini ajratgan.
Xonalar o‘lchamlari 72 kv.m dan 2000 kv.m gacha ponorama deraza oynalar va baland shiftlarga ega. Yer osti avtoturargohi va noyob fasadga ega “Usta Shirin”  majmuasi biznesingizni ilgari surish uchun ajoyib imkoniyatdir.
Siz zamonaviy yangi “Usta Shirin” binosida eng qulay uy egasi bo‘lishni xohlaysizmi? Modern Stroy kompaniyasidan 0 foiz aksiya sizga xonadonlarni boshlang‘ich to‘lovsiz sotib olish imkoniyatini hamda 20 oy davomida foizsiz to‘lovlarni amalga oshirish va sovg‘a sifatida doimiy ro‘yxatdan o‘tish huquqini beradi!
Shoshiling! O‘zingiz va yaqinlaringiz uchun eng qulay sharoitlarni taqdim etish imkoniyatidan foydalaning!  Hayotdan rohatlaning va Modern Stroy o‘z g‘amxo‘rligini bildiradi.

text:
Reliable and safe housing is the most important criterion for a prosperous life

04 Nov 2019, 09:00




Master Shirin is a residential complex that complies with all international standards and provides luxurious living conditions for you and your family. Modern Stroy Construction Company is in the process of construction of a new residential complex Usta Shirin. The latest technologies and high quality materials are used in the construction process. It is worth noting the convenient location of the complex. The complex under construction is located in an area with all amenities.



Apartments range from 63 m² to 600 m². There are also penthouses. Here you can enjoy the quiet of the city without the noise of the city. The building is so structured that it gets sunlight on both sides of the apartment during the day. In addition, you will enjoy fresh air because of the well-selected construction sites.



There are also artificial pools, landscaped parks, fitness centers, pools and playgrounds in our area. Taking care of the health of the population, we tried to provide them with conditions that are appropriate for a healthy lifestyle.



Three-storey (10-storey) residential complex with a total area of 1.07 hectares offers the following facilities:

Porcelain window frames;
Terrace balconies up to 2.3m wide;
Rooms with 3 meter high ceilings;
Special heating system
Constant cleanliness by internal staff
Fitness Center and Pool
Ecological house, artificial pools, landscaped gardens
Summer (outdoor) and winter (indoor) playgrounds
Open pavilions and benches in the residential complex
Underground parking
24 hour security
Improved infrastructure (restaurants, outlets, entertainment facilities)
Provision with Smart Home system
The use of energy-efficient systems for lighting fixtures and environmental solar panels
High speed, noiseless ponoramic elevators in accordance with modern European standards.
Local Pre-School




We would like to emphasize the sale of non-residential premises in the Usta Shirin residential complex.



For your business, our company has allocated 1-2 floors as well as the basement area.
Room sizes range from 72 sq. To 2,000 sq. Ft. Windows and high ceilings. Underground parking and a unique facade "Usta Shirin" is a great opportunity to promote your business.
Do you want to be the most comfortable host in the new "Master Dessert" building? 0% stake in Modern Stroy gives you the opportunity to buy a home without a first charge, and to register for 20 months without interest and to register as a gift!
Hurry up! Get the most out of your comfort for yourself and your loved ones! Enjoy life and Modern Stroy is a caretaker.
